snippet: With the composer on hand, Alan Gilbert and the New York Philharmonic introduced Steven Stucky’s new, accessible Symphony at Lincoln Center on Thursday night.
abstract: Anthony Tommasini reviews premiere of Steven Stucky classical music piece Symphony, performed by New York Philharmonic, at Avery Fisher Hall.
lead_paragraph: With the composer on hand, Alan Gilbert and the New York Philharmonic introduced Steven Stucky’s new, accessible Symphony at Lincoln Center on Thursday night.

headline.seo: New York Philharmonic Plays Steven Stucky’s Symphony
headline.main: A New Work Bares Its Secrets, With Feeling
headline.print_headline: A New Work Bares Its Secrets, With Feeling
